start.title: The start time to query in expr format e.g. now(), now() - duration("1h"), now() - duration("{{args.lookback_duration}}")

end.title: The end time to query in expr format e.g. now(), now() - duration("1h"), now() - duration("{{args.lookback_duration}}")

step.description: The maximum time between two slices from the start to end (e.g. 30s, 5m, 1h).

title: Arguments to perform a prometheus range query
